chat_responses.greeting: Hey there! I see you own the Summertime Blues NFT - that's a beautiful 1970 Chevrolet Suburban! What would you like to know about your classic surfer wagon?
chat_responses.car_details: Your Summertime Blues is a 1970 Chevrolet Suburban in blue - a post-modern surfer wagon built in Southern California. It's the perfect blend of classic American automotive design and surf culture!
chat_responses.history: The Summertime Blues represents the golden age of American surf culture. This 1970 Suburban was transformed into a surfer wagon, perfect for carrying boards to the beach and cruising the California coast.
chat_responses.technical_specs: Your 1970 Chevrolet Suburban features: Engine - V8, Body - Steel construction with custom wood paneling, Weight - ~4,500 lbs, Transmission - 3-speed automatic, Drive - Rear-wheel drive, Perfect for surf adventures!
chat_responses.features: Special features of your Summertime Blues: Custom wood paneling, Surfboard mounting system, Classic 1970s styling, Hand-crafted details, Southern California surf culture heritage
chat_responses.cultural_significance: The Summertime Blues is deeply embedded in American surf culture. It represents freedom, adventure, and the California lifestyle - featured in countless surf movies and songs as a symbol of the surfing era.
chat_responses.color_info: Your Summertime Blues features a beautiful blue color scheme - the perfect hue for a surfer wagon. The blue represents the ocean and sky, essential elements of the surf lifestyle.
chat_responses.year_info: Built in 1970, your Suburban comes from the peak of the American automotive era. This was when cars were built to last and designed with style - perfect for the surf culture that was exploding in California.
chat_responses.default_response: That's a great question about your Summertime Blues! This 1970 Chevrolet Suburban is a true classic. What would you like to know about it? I can tell you about its history, technical specs, features, or cultural significance.

metadata.purpose: DRIVR agent chat responses for Summertime Blues NFT testing
